Resume.objDetail: A motivated fresh graduate with a strong interest in web application and backend development. Experienced in building web systems using TypeScript, Node.js, and Databases, with hands-on experience in modern development tools and workflows. Seeking a Web Developer role with strong motivation and eagerness to learn the PHP Laravel Framework, while contributing to the development of maintainable, efficient, and scalable systems. A proactive team player who enjoys problem-solving, supporting teammates, and continuously improving technical skills.
Resume.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
Resume.detail_1:
Deployed a Linux server using Rocky Linux 9 on Linode cloud platform to host web applications.
Configured services including DNS server, Apache web server, MySQL database, and SSH for remote access.
Resume.sec_2: IT Support Intern, Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Co., Ltd.
Resume.detail_2:
Provided technical support to end-users, resolving hardware and software issues.
Assisted in setting up, configuring, and maintaining workstations, printers, and network equipment.
Resume.sec_3: NATIONAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT AGENCY (กลุ่มนวัตกรรมดิจิทัลสำหรับเมือง, Traffy Team)
Resume.detail_3: Developed a LINE Chat Bot to facilitate the reporting of issues in LINE groups, enhancing communication and issue resolution.

Designed a modular Frontend-Backend architecture integrating Google Forms, Google Sheets, and Encore.ts for automated scheduling and API service
Resume.topic: Practical Training: "Development of Email Servers to Support Thai Language Emails (EAI)" by THNIC
Resume.eai_detail:
Participated in an intensive hands-on workshop conducted by THNIC aimed at equipping participants with the skills to develop email servers capable of supporting Thai language emails (EAI).
Successfully configured and deployed personal email servers using Ubuntu operating system, enabling practical experience in server setup and administration.

About.sec_1: I am a Computer Engineering graduate with a strong passion for web application and backend development. I enjoy building systems that are reliable, maintainable, and scalable, and I am comfortable working with both development and server-side environments.
About.sec_2:
I develop web applications and backend systems using modern technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, and SQL databases, and I have hands-on experience deploying and configuring services on Linux servers.
I am particularly interested in backend logic, system integration, and infrastructure that supports real-world applications.
About.sec_3-1:
Write clean, understandable, and maintainable code
Learn new technologies continuously
Enjoy problem-solving and tackling technical challenges
Value teamwork, communication, and supporting others
About.sec_3-2: I am always eager to improve my skills and adapt to new tools and frameworks.
